entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, a boy who is remembering his last meeting with someone and is waiting for Hedwig to return. (Excerpt: 'Harry had come face-to-face with him at Hogwarts.' and 'He scanned the starry sky for a sign of Hedwig...')

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, which is expected to return with a dead mouse. (Excerpt: 'He scanned the starry sky for a sign of Hedwig...')

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school where Harry had met someone before. (Excerpt: 'Harry had come face-to-face with him at Hogwarts.')

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: The street where Harry is standing, and the owls are flying over a lamp. (Excerpt: 'But then the bizarre creature soared over one of the street lamps of Privet Drive...')

entities.name: the creature
entities.description: A large, lopsided creature that is flying towards Harry. (Excerpt: 'Silhouetted against the golden moon, and growing larger every moment, was a large, strangely lopsided creature...')

entities.name: the owls
entities.description: Three owls that are flying towards Harry, two of them holding up the third. (Excerpt: 'Through the window soared three owls, two of them holding up the third...')

relationships.description: Harry is waiting for Hedwig to return with a dead mouse. (Excerpt: 'He scanned the starry sky for a sign of Hedwig...')
Harry had met someone at Hogwarts. (Excerpt: 'Harry had come face-to-face with him at Hogwarts.')
Hedwig belongs to Harry. (Implicit, as Hedwig is expected to return to Harry.)
The creature is flying towards Harry. (Excerpt: 'Silhouetted against the golden moon, and growing larger every moment, was a large, strangely lopsided creature...')
The owls are flying towards Harry. (Excerpt: 'Through the window soared three owls, two of them holding up the third...')
